question: What will be [PERSON/ENTITY]'s approval rating on [DATE]?
description: Predict the approval rating percentage. Current rating: [CURRENT_RATING]%
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the [POLL_SOURCE] average on [DATE].

The final percentage will be scaled to 2 decimal places (e.g., 45.6% = 4560) for settlement.
Only the specified polling aggregator will be used.
If multiple polls are published on resolution day, the average will be used.
Market range: [MIN_VALUE_FORMATTED]% - [MAX_VALUE_FORMATTED]%
